infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to scan QR codes and take photos for complaints.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to upload images for complaints.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your camera to scan QR codes and take photos.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your photos for uploading complaint images.
